sections.general: ONLINE LEARNING COORDINATOR - PROGRAM TRAINING AND SUPPORT
sections.summary:
To effectively and innovatively influence student and staff knowledge and skills with learning technologies and learning management systems through
support and online education.
Core Qualifications
Creating and presenting district-
level staff development for
educational software programs
Multiple Learning Management System platform experience: Schoology, Desire2Learn (D2L),
Creating and facilitating all required
Moodle, Blackboard
professional development for all
Multiple platforms to enhance the use of technology as a mode of learning: mobile learning,
departments in a district of 5,000+
tablet computing, online professional development, online courses for credit (both virtual and in
employees
the classroom), educational software as instruction and as supplemental to instruction,
Certified Trainer of Trainers (ToT)
gamification, video tutorials
for SIOP (Sheltered Instruction
Observation Protocol)
implementation in the classroom
